name: MortgageCalc
0:
”Alexa, open Mortgage Calc”
”Alexa, ask Mortgage Calc to calculate my monthly payment on a 100000 dollar loan for 30 years with 5 percent interest.”
”Alexa, start Mortgage Calc”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mortgage calc
des: This skill calculates your monthly mortgage payments. Provide your principal loan amount, percent interest and term in years.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
